title: Understanding Cancer Pt.3
brief_description: This program is the final part of a three part documentary that looks at cancer. The program concentrates on the three main types of treatment that are offered to cancer patients - surgery, chemotherapy, and radiotherapy. Specialists in these fields discuss the treatments and when it is appropriate to use them.
